  0 = path and collectable
  1 = wall
  2 = collectable collected
  3 = player start
  4 = ghost spawn
  5 = specials
  6 = 1 direction wall for ghosts
  7 = Fence normal
  8 = Fence Rotated
  9 = FarmHouse
  10 = Helicopers
  11 = Maze entrance
  13 = Open Field space
  14 = Entered Maze trigger
  15 = Collision Blocks
